name: Bridge Bot
description: Bridge Bot is a capture the flag and bridge-building combo, played against a robot opponent. However, just like most wrestling leagues, you share a hidden, common goal - money. While the robot is most likely much better than you are at the game, you as the human can make the fight more entertaining, thus resulting in more profits for the both of you. (The audience, is mostly humans, though, so still try to win.) Made for the 2022 Wowie Game Jam.
